***Kvalifikationer och färdigheter:***

* 5+ års dokumenterad erfarenhet som Azure-arkitekt med stark tekniskt fokus och problemlösningsförmåga.
* Utmärkta kommunikationsfärdigheter på svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift.
* Erfarenhet av att översätta kundens behov till konkreta designförslag och implementeringar.
* Erfarenhet från konsultbranschen med förmåga att arbeta i både stora och små team.
* Erfarenhet av design och implementering av lösningar i det publika molnet, med fokus på kostnadsoptimering, säkerhet, skalbarhet, prestanda och tillgänglighet.
* Kompetens inom programmerings- och/eller skriptspråk (Powershell, Bash, Python etc.).
* Erfarenhet av CI/CD-verktyg som Azure DevOps eller GitHub.
* Erfarenhet av Infrastructure as Code (ARM, Bicep, Terraform etc.).
* Förståelse och erfarenhet av ramverk som Microsoft Cloud Adoption Framework, Security Adoption Framework samt Well-Architected Framework
* Kunskap inom molnsäkerhet och Zero Trust arkitektur.
* Erfarenhet av containerlösningar som Docker och Kubernetes är meriterande.

 ***Vad du får hos oss***

* Spännande och varierande uppdrag hos intressanta kunder
* En arbetsplats med högt i tak, öppen kommunikation och härliga kollegor
* Lön som speglar din erfarenhet

  

Har du frågor? Hör av dig till **Fredrik Steveling** på mail, **fredrik.steveling@mrcbemanning.se** – vi berättar gärna mer om rollen och oss som arbetsgivare.

Solutions Engineer, Splunk
  
  

Meet the Team
  
Splunk, a Cisco company, is building a safer and more resilient digital world with an end-to-end full stack platform made for a hybrid, multi-cloud world. Leading enterprises use our unified security and observability platform to keep their digital systems secure and reliable. Our customers love our technology, but it's our caring employees that make Splunk stand out as an amazing career destination. No matter where in the world or what level of the organization, we approach our work with kindness. So bring your work experience, problem-solving skills and talent, of course, but also bring your joy, your passion and all the things that make you, you. Come help organizations be their best, while you reach new heights with a team that has your back.
  
  

Your Impact
  
This is an opportunity to work at a company that is changing the way information supports business decisions. At Splunk,we've grown rapidly across Europe by helping leading companies (including 90 of the Fortune 100) go from data to business outcomes faster than ever.
  
Now, with the combined strength of Cisco and Splunk, we are accelerating innovation in AI-driven analytics and security, empowering customers to unlock even greater value from their data. Together, we are shaping the future of data and AI to solve complex business challengesat scale.
  
  

Join us on our journey asSplunk Solutions Engineer, and enjoy a culture of inclusiveness, disruption, and fun while selling smart and winning big.
  
  

Role description
  
  

* You will technically own, discover, position, prove and deliver the key technical elements of a sales cycle to achieve a ‘technical win’ within medium to large scale and complex customer environments.You’ll use a range of communication styles, a range of technology skills andexperiences and a range of soft skills and people skills to developtrust relationships with both your sales colleagues and your customers.
* You will be an advocate and ambassador for Splunk through your professional social media, industry and marketing events and supporting pipeline generation activities
* You will collaborate with your customer contacts, and build them into Splunk champions, by helping them to understand how Splunk can help them to solve some of their most challenging problems and help them achieve theirobjectives.


Responsibilities
  
  

* Ability to demonstrate Splunk products and services to customers on site, remotely viawebinar sessions, and at field events such as conferences and trade shows.
* Establish andmaintain strong relationships throughout the sales cycle with all levels within the customer.
* Willing to travel to visit prospects and customers, and to engage in onsite customer work whenrequired.
* Answer complex technical and competitive questions plus address customer concerns to a successful outcome.
* You should haveexperience with discovering pain anddetermining value with customers.
* You should be comfortable working for a dynamic technical organization with a rapidly expanding customer base.
* Collaborating with multiple Account Managers to explore opportunities simultaneously, driving discovery calls, and evaluating each prospect toidentify the most promising next steps.


Do these characteristics describe YOU?
  
  

* Curiosity: You tend to want to understand thewhyof a scenario as much as thewhatand typically use a range of skills to discover whether the first response to the question really describes the situation or its implications
* Customer Success: Selling is great, but customers being successful with your solutions is one of your main motivations.
* Technically Astute: You enjoy thedetail, even if youdon’t always need to express it. You have a thirst for up-to-date knowledge of the technologies and solutions that businesses use to be successful as they transform.
* Confidence: But not arrogant – you have the confidence that comes from the knowledge that your product is rock solid, and the ability totransmit this confidence to a customer. That means you might sit down with a customer already using your product to show them how they might use it even better!
* Business Savvy: You understand how businesses are organized, how they achieve their desired results, what challenges they are likely to face, what solutions theyneed and what transformations they could make with your solutions.
* A growth mindset: You build in time to develop your skills, knowledge,experience or capabilities. You look beyond the current opportunity towards the wider set of opportunities that could exist in a prospect.
* A Collaborator: You understand that selling is a team game, so you spend time developing your network of colleagues and partners to achieve your success – and theirs.
* Competitive: Ifyou’re in it, you want to win it!
* Fun: Getting the job done and enjoying& generating fundon’t need to be mutually exclusive.
* The candidate must be based in Sweden and be fluent in Swedish and English.


Helpful technical skills or experience (not all required, but consider how Splunk could benefit from your background)
  
  

* Domain knowledge and experience in IT infrastructure, Cloud Technologies, Application Delivery, Business Analytics, Log Management, Observability, and IT Security
* Insights in IT Operations: Experience with ITSM tools and ITIL processes such as incident, problem, and change
* Understanding of IT Monitoring, Security Monitoring, and Observability—including experience with tools for infrastructure, application performance (APM), and security event monitoring (SIEM) across logs, metrics, and traces
* Modern application architecture (microservices): Understanding or experience with Kubernetes, Docker, and/or Lambda/serverless
* Familiarity with DevOps concepts and hands-on experience in engineering/software development, using modern programming languages such as Java, Python, PHP, .NET, Ruby,js, Go, etc.


Why Cisco?
  
  

At Cisco, we’re revolutionizing how data and infrastructure connect and protect organizations in the AI era – and beyond. We’ve been innovating fearlessly for 40 years to create solutions that power how humans and technology work together across the physical and digital worlds. These solutions provide customers with unparalleled security, visibility, and insights across the entire digital footprint.
  
Fueled by the depth and breadth of our technology, we experiment and create meaningful solutions. Add to that our worldwide network of doers and experts, and you’ll see that the opportunities to grow and build are limitless. We work as a team, collaborating with empathy to make really big things happen on a global scale. Because our solutions are everywhere, our impact is everywhere.
  
We are Cisco, and our power starts with you.
company_description: Our Purpose at Cisco is to Power an Inclusive Future for All. We do that by revolutionizing how data and infrastructure securely connect and protect organizations in the AI era – and beyond.

title: Cloud Engineer
description:
***Cloud Architect & Engineers - AWS***




***Leading Nordic IT Consultancy Company - Sweden***




  





 Would you like the opportunity to join Sweden's fastest-growing IT organizations in the Nordics, renowned for delivering secure and cutting-edge Cloud solutions to high-profile enterprises and public entities.
 



  





 In the last 3 years they have grown their market leading business to over 500 colleagues, with significant growth and investment occurring in their cloud division. They work with the largest enterprises in the Nordics and cover the entire spectrum from public cloud to private cloud, including air-gapped solutions for defense and national security. Some of the assignments may therefore require security clearance.
 



  





**Requirements:** 




  




* 3+ years experience of Cloud Architecture in AWS.
* Nice to have - Cloud Adoption Framework (CAF) or Well-Architected Framework (WAF)
* Swedish speaking, Swedish citizenship.
* Infrastructure-as-Code (Terraform or CloudFormation)
* DevOps & CI/CD - GitHub Actions or similar tools



  





 You don't have to be an expert and know all of this, but you must be both curious and willing to learn.
 



  





**Some of what they offer:** 




  




* 6 weeks vacation and certification bonuses
* Good pension and insurance schemes
* Contribution to SATS membership and access to company cabins
* One of the Nordic's largest professional community within cloud technologies, where knowledge sharing is central



  





  





*Thank you for your interest in this opportunity. If your application is successful, we will contact you to discuss the position in more detail within 48 hours of receiving your CV. Please assume your application has been unsuccessful if you do not hear back from us within 48 hours.*

title: Cloud Architect
description:
🌐 Azure/AWS Cloud Architect – Stockholm & Malmö
 



  





**Location:** 
 Stockholm / Malmö (Hybrid – minimum 3 days onsite, sometimes 5 depending on project phase)
 



  





**Language Requirements:** 
 Swedish & English (fluency required)
 



  





**Citizenship:** 
 Swedish citizens only (single citizenship, due to security clearance requirements with certain clients)
 



  





**About the Company** 




  





 Join one of Europe’s most established and trusted IT consultancies, with 50,000 employees across 30 countries and 600 colleagues in Sweden. With a strong financial foundation, consistent project pipeline, and a reputation for delivering on critical digital transformation initiatives in
 **government, telecom, defence, healthcare, and energy** 
 , this is an opportunity to build your career within socially impactful projects that shape the future of Sweden.
 



  





 You’ll be part of a team of 20+ cloud specialists (majority in Stockholm, with presence in Malmö), working with industry leaders like
 **Telia, Vattenfall, and Region Stockholm** 
 on complex and high-visibility assignments.
 



  





**The Role - Cloud Architect** 




  





 As a
 **hands-on Cloud Architect** 
 , you will translate business needs into scalable, secure, and cost-efficient cloud solutions across Azure and AWS. You’ll be both technical and advisory, acting as a trusted expert for clients while collaborating closely with developers, project managers, and stakeholders.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 




  




* **Architecture & Design:** 
 Define and implement secure, scalable, and cost-optimized architectures using frameworks like CAF, WAF, and Security Reference Architecture.
* **Infrastructure as Code:** 
 Build and manage solutions with Terraform, Bicep, ARM, CloudFormation, and CDK.
* **Automation & Optimization:** 
 Drive automation of workflows, deployments, and operations with Azure DevOps, AWS CodePipeline, GitHub Actions, or Jenkins.
* **Advisory & Collaboration:** 
 Partner with clients as a trusted advisor, supporting them through their cloud adoption journeys.
* **Security & Governance:** 
 Apply best practices in security, compliance, and governance across enterprise environments.
* **DevOps & Scripting:** 
 Contribute to CI/CD and automation initiatives using PowerShell, Bash, or Python.



  





**What We’re Looking For** 




  




* 7+ years’ experience in cloud solution design and implementation (Azure and/or AWS).
* Proven ability to translate business needs into technical architecture with focus on
 **security, scalability, cost-efficiency, and performance** 
 .
* Practical knowledge of cloud adoption frameworks (Microsoft CAF, AWS WAF, Security Reference Architecture).
* Experience with
 **CI/CD tools** 
 (Azure DevOps, Jenkins, GitHub Actions, CodePipeline).
* Container knowledge (Docker, Kubernetes) – a strong plus.
* Consultancy background and pre-sales experience – meritorious.
* Relevant certifications (Azure Solutions Architect Expert, AWS Solutions Architect Professional, etc.) – essential.
* **Swedish fluency and Swedish citizenship** 
 .



  





**What’s in it for You?** 




  





 ✔ A financially stable, global consultancy with
 **long-term career development** 
 opportunities
 



 ✔ Access to
 **socially critical projects** 
 that make a difference in Sweden
 



 ✔ Work with the
 **latest cloud technologies** 
 in large-scale enterprise environments
 



 ✔ Competitive package:
 


* **6 weeks vacation**
* **Wellness allowance**
* **ITP pension**
* **Hybrid working model (min. 3 days onsite)**
* Collective agreement & full office equipment



  





 Why Apply?
 



  





 This is a unique opportunity to join a
 **well-known, respected consultancy brand** 
 with the scale, stability, and client trust to secure projects in
 **defence, government, and critical infrastructure** 
 . You’ll not only architect solutions but also see the real impact of your work on Sweden’s digital transformation.
 



  





 👉 Apply today and become part of a
 **team of cloud experts driving innovation in critical sectors across Sweden** 
 .

title: Azure Integration Engineer
description:
* Help design, build and continuously improve the clients online platform.
* Research, suggest and implement new technology solutions following best practices/standards.
* Take responsibility for the resiliency and availability of different products.
* Be a productive member of the team.


 Requirements
   

  

* Design & Development – Architect, design, and build robust, scalable, and secure integration workflows using Azure Logic Apps, Azure Functions, and Azure Data Factory.
* API Management – Manage the full API lifecycle with Azure API Management (APIM), including implementing security policies (OAuth2, JWT), rate limiting, caching, and data transformation.
* Collaboration – Partner with cross-functional teams, stakeholders, and clients to gather requirements and translate them into clear technical specifications and integration solutions.
* Troubleshooting & Support – Provide advanced technical support, monitor integration performance, and resolve complex issues to maintain high availability and reliability.
* Security & Compliance – Apply security best practices (Azure AD, managed identities) and ensure all integrations comply with organizational security and governance standards.
* Documentation – Create and maintain comprehensive technical documentation for API endpoints, integration processes, solution designs, and configurations.
* DevOps & Automation – Work with DevOps teams to build and maintain CI/CD pipelines using Azure DevOps or GitHub Actions for streamlined, automated deployments.
* Strong proficiency in Azure Integration Services, APIM, Azure Logic Apps, Azure Functions, Azure Service Bus, and Azure Data Factory.
* Solid understanding of RESTful APIs, SOAP, XML/JSON, and enterprise application integration (EAI) patterns.
* Experience with programming languages such as C#, .NET, Python, or JavaScript.
* Familiarity with Azure SQL, Cosmos DB, and related database technologies.
* Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills for debugging complex integration and data flow issues.
* Strong communication skills to effectively convey technical concepts across technical and business teams.
* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or a related field (preferred).
* Microsoft Azure certifications (Azure Developer Associate, Azure Solutions Architect Expert) are an added advantage.


 Benefits
   

  

* A challenging, innovating environment.
* Opportunities for learning where needed.

title: Founding Engineer
description:
**Company Description** 




 CYBRET AI is a cutting-edge research lab dedicated to pioneering AI-driven security solutions. With a focus on both autonomous security systems involving human oversight and independent operations, CYBRET AI works to address critical challenges in cybersecurity. Based on innovation and advanced research, the organization aims to revolutionize the integration of artificial intelligence in safeguarding global digital ecosystems. The lab emphasizes collaboration and robust technology development to contribute to a safer digital future.
 



  





**Role Description** 




 This is a full-time, on-site position for a Founding Engineer based in Stockholm. The Founding Engineer will play a pivotal role in designing, developing, and deploying advanced AI-driven security solutions. Responsibilities include spearheading the development of scalable software systems, conducting research to improve AI algorithms, collaborating with cross-functional teams, and overseeing engineering processes. Additionally, the engineer will contribute to technical strategy and product roadmaps to advance the company’s long-term vision.
 



  





**Qualifications** 



* Strong proficiency in software engineering, including proficiency in programming languages such as Python, C++, or Java
* Experience with AI and machine learning frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch) and knowledge of developing and implementing algorithms
* In-depth understanding of cybersecurity principles, including threat detection and prevention, and experience developing security software solutions
* Familiarity with cloud computing, distributed systems, and scalable architectures
* Excellent problem-solving, analytical, and critical-thinking skills
* Ability to work collaboratively in a high-energy startup environment
* Master's or Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field; advanced degree preferred or work experience
* Experience in a leadership or team-building role is a significant advantage



  





  





 Bonus
 



 -If you have STEM Olympiad acheviements
 



 -Top achivements
 



  





  





**Compensation and Benefits** 



* Competitive salary with equity participation
* High-performance laptop provided
* Covered mobile phone and wifi expenses
* Fully remote work environment
* Annual learning and development stipend of 500 USD

title: Testare/Kravare Lumera
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.
   

  

**Din profil (Skall krav)**
* Lumera
* XML
* Erfarenhet och kunskap om pension


**Sista ansökningdatum:** 
 11-12-2025
   

  

**Om Oss**
 Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?
   

  

 Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Här påverkar du din egen lön som helt och hållet som baseras på ditt timpris mot kund.
   

  

 Vår lönemodell är en hybridlösning mellan en fast månadslön och en provisionsbaserad ersättning. Det innebär att din månadslön baseras på ditt timpris, fast om du mot förmodan skulle stå utan uppdrag så behåller du en grund lön fram tills vi hittat ett nytt uppdrag, bra va?
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.
   

  

 🌟 En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.
   

  

 🚗 Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.
   

  

 💼 Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.
   

  

 🌴 Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?
   

  

 🏥 Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.
   

  

 📚 Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.
   

  

 🕑 Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?
   

  

* Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.

title: QA Specialist
description:
**QA Engineer – High-Growth Web3 iGaming Platform (Stockholm)** 




*Take ownership of the entire QA function in a fast-scaling product company.* 




  





 I’m supporting a rapidly growing Stockholm-based technology company that has built a fully white-label
 **Web3 iGaming platform** 
 used by creators, streamers, and businesses to launch their own online casino products.
 



  





 They handle
 *everything* 
 end-to-end, licensing, payments, compliance, hosting, security, transactions, while customers focus on content and growth.
 



  





 They are now looking for a
 **QA Engineer** 
 who can take
 **full responsibility** 
 for testing across their front-end, back-end, and platform services as they continue to scale.
 



  





**The Role** 




  





 This is a chance to step into a
 **high-impact, hands-on QA role** 
 where you will:
 



  




* Own the
 **entire QA process** 
 across the product
* Define and establish
 **testing strategy, tools, and frameworks**
* Build scalable
 **test plans, test cases, test automation** 
 , and release workflows
* Work closely with engineering, design & product to ship features safely and quickly
* Identify, prioritise, and communicate defects and quality risks
* Introduce QA discipline into a fast-moving, startup-style environment
* Drive improvements in
 **performance, reliability, usability, and reproducibility**



  





 You’ll be the
 **go-to person** 
 for everything QA, a chance to shape the process from the ground up.
 



  





**Tech Environment** 




  





 You don’t need to have experience with every tool, but the environment includes:
 



  




* **JavaScript/TypeScript**
* **React** 
 front-end
* **Node.js** 
 back-end
* Automated testing tools/frameworks (Cypress, Playwright, Selenium, etc.)
* API & integration testing
* CI/CD pipelines
* Cloud environments (AWS)



  





 Experience in
 **high-traffic, transactional systems** 
 or
 **iGaming** 
 is a big plus.
 



  





**What They’re Looking For** 




  





 Someone who is:
 



  




* Skilled in both
 **manual and automated testing**
* Confident owning QA end to end
* Able to work closely with developers in a highly collaborative team
* Strong at building structure in a scaling environment
* Proactive, curious, and comfortable with fast iteration cycles
* Excited by Web3, gaming, or real-time transactional platforms



  





**Why This Role Is Exciting** 




  




* Massive product ownership – you drive quality across the entire platform
* No red tape – quick decisions, quick releases
* Direct impact on a real-time, revenue-driving product
* Work with a modern stack in a company scaling internationally
* Chance to build the QA function your way

title: Systems Engineer
description:
**Systems Engineer - Tactical Functions,** 
**Ground Support Systems** 
**Saab AB**
 Join our dynamic engineering team at Tactical Functions, Saab, where we develop and deliver complex software solutions for Electronic Warfare systems. In this role, you will play a crucial part in defining requirements, managing scope, and ensuring the successful delivery of software releases.
   

  

**Electronic Warfare** 
 Electronic Warfare (EW) involves using signals such as radio, infrared, or radar to sense, protect, and disrupt adversaries’ abilities. As a Systems Engineer, you will contribute to the development of EW systems that are critical for national security and defence.
   

  

**Your Role**
 As a Systems Engineer, you will be involved in all aspects of the software development lifecycle, from requirements definition to system integration and verification. You will work closely with stakeholders to understand their needs and translate them into actionable requirements. Additionally, you will manage the scope of software releases, balancing stakeholder needs with technical constraints.
   

  

 Your role will include developing and maintaining system architectures and designs, as well as supporting the creation of system documentation. You will also participate in risk management activities, identifying and mitigating potential issues.
   

  

 Furthermore, you will prepare documentation for design reviews, conduct reviews with customers, and create operational and administrative manuals. Ensuring requirements traceability throughout the development lifecycle and managing configurations will also be part of your responsibilities.
   

  

* Define and manage system requirements, ensuring they are complete, correct, and traceable.
* Collaborate with software developers, testers, and other engineers to ensure requirements are implemented correctly.
* Conduct system integration and verification activities.
* Maintain test strategies.


**What To Expect**
* A challenging and varied role, with opportunities to work on complex systems.
* Collaboration with a multidisciplinary team.
* A focus on continuous learning and improvement.
* Opportunities for professional growth within the company.


**About Us** 
 The engineering team at Tactical Functions is dedicated to delivering high-quality software solutions. We value curiosity, collaboration, and a systematic approach to problem-solving. We encourage initiatives to improve our engineering processes and tools. We highly value open communication, respect, and having fun together. Furthermore, it is important to us that you have an accepting attitude towards people regardless of whom you meet. Our work has a significant impact on national security and defence.
   

  

**Your Profile** 
 We are looking for an experienced and motivated Systems Engineer who is eager to learn and always trying to improve themselves. You actively support and contribute to an innovative engineering culture.
   

  

* Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Engineering, Computer Science, or a related field.
* Proven experience as a Systems Engineer, with a strong background in requirements management and software releases.
* Experience with system architecture and design.
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
* Experience with system integration and verification.
* Fluent in Swedish and English.


**Location and Travel** 
 We are currently located in Järfälla but will move to Solna in early 2026. Since you will collaborate with colleagues on other Saab sites, you might travel occasionally. Saab is a global company and could provide the possibility to work abroad.
   

  

**Security Vetting** 
 This position requires that you pass a security vetting based on the current regulations around security protection. For positions requiring security clearance, additional obligations on citizenship may apply.
   

  

 What you will be a part of
   

  

 Saab is a leading defence and security company with an enduring mission, to help nations keep their people and society safe. Empowered by its 18,000 talented people, Saab constantly pushes the boundaries of technology to create a safer, more sustainable and more equitable world.
   

  

 Business area Surveillance offers world-leading sensor technology in monitoring and decision support to protect against threats. The portfolio covers airborne, ground-based and naval radar, electronic warfare, C4I solutions, aviation systems and cyber security.
   

  

 Operations are conducted in Sweden, the United States, the UK, Australia, Germany, South Africa, the United Arab Emirates, Denmark and Finland.
   

  

*If you aspire to help create and innovate whilst developing yourself in a learning culture, Saab may well have the perfect conditions for you to grow. We pride ourselves on a nurturing environment, where everyone is different yet we share the same goal – to keep people and society safe.*
 Read more about us here

title: Windowstekniker till PAM
description:
*Vill du påverka och göra skillnad på riktigt? Här bidrar du till att skapa trygghet för människor och samhällen. Det du gör spelar roll.*
**Din roll**
 Vi söker nu nya medarbetare till teamet som arbetar med PAM - priviliged Access Management. Saabs IT-avdelning, Group IT, växer stadigt och du kommer bli en del av en dynamisk och innovativ arbetsplats där din medverkan bidrar till en säker hantering av Saab's priviligerade accesser. Du kommer att arbeta i vårt PAM-team och med våra arbetssätt leverera värde till Saabs Business Areas.
   

  

 Arbetet utförs på plats, i detta fall Saabs kontor Linköping eller Järfälla, där Järfälla kommer bytas till Solna under våren
   

  

 Arbetsuppgifter består bland annat av:
   

  

* Utveckla och drifta PAM-verktyget CyberArk
* Hantera frågor och olika typer av ärenden i vårt ärendesystem
* Samarbeta med övriga tekniska team för att tillsammans leverera hög-kvalitativa lösningar
* Utveckla och underhålla vår dokumentation
* Leverera stöd till kollegor, i och utanför teamet


**Din profil**
 Vi söker passionerade och kunniga medarbetare i rollen för att stärka vårt team och ta vår PAM-plattform till nya höjder. Som person är du intresserad av att utvecklas och lära dig, du är engagerad och tycker om att arbeta mot mål och fokusera på resultat. För oss är det av största vikt att du är en lagspelare som bidrar till teamets fortsatta utveckling.
   

  

 För att lyckas i rollen ser vi att du har kunskaper inom;
   

  

* Windows Infrastruktur / server
* Katalogtjänster såsom Active Directory
* IT-Drift / Kundkontakt


 Meriterande är erfarenhet av:
   

  

* PAM
* Powershell
* Linux


 Befattningen kräver att du genomgår och godkänns enligt vid var tid gällande bestämmelser för säkerhetsskydd. För befattningar där Saab har krav på säkerhetsklassinplacering kan, i förekommande fall, medföra krav på visst medborgarskap.
   

  

**Vad du blir en del av**
 Upptäck oändliga möjligheter. Anta utmaningar, skapa smarta innovationer och uppgradera dina förmågor. Det här är en plats för kluriga tänkare, modiga pionjärer och alla däremellan. Tillsammans uppnår vi det extraordinära, var och en tar med sitt unika perspektiv. Varje bidrag räknas.
   

  

 Saab är ett ledande försvars- och säkerhetsföretag med uppdrag att hjälpa nationer att skydda sin befolkning och bidrar till trygghet för människor och samhällen. Med 26,100 talangfulla medarbetare utvecklar Saab teknik och lösningar för en säkrare och mer hållbar värld.
   

  

 Saab utvecklar, tillverkar och underhåller avancerade system inom flygteknik, vapen, ledningssystem, sensorer och undervattenssystem. Saab har sitt huvudkontor i Sverige men en global verksamhet där Saab är en del av många nationers försvarsförmåga. Läs mer om oss här

title: Verksamhetsutvecklare digital innovation och AI
description:
Vill du skapa värde genom digital innovation och ny teknologi som gör skillnad för Sveriges energiförsörjning?
   

  

 Nu söker vi en verksamhetsutvecklare till enheten Digitalisering & Innovation som kommer bidra till att öka takten i införandet och användandet av ny teknologi som värdeskapare för hela Svenska kraftnät.
   

  

 Svenska kraftnät är en nyckelaktör i energiomställningen. Vår IT-division växer för att möjliggöra en fördubblad elproduktion och en fossilfri framtid. Med ny teknik ökar vi både infrastrukturens kapacitet och utvecklingstakten inom digitalisering och processer.
   

  

**Om tjänsten**
 Som verksamhetsutvecklare inom digital innovation och AI får du en nyckelroll i att omsätta ny teknologi till konkret värde för hela Svenska kraftnäts verksamhet. Du arbetar nära verksamheten för att förstå behov, identifiera lösningar och driva införande av ny teknologi. Du blir en del av ett ambitiöst team med både bred och djup kompetens inom strategi och teknologi. Som team vill vi alltid lite mer – vi utmanar oss själva och vår omgivning för att skapa verklig nytta.
   

  

 Exempel på arbetsuppgifter
   

  

* Identifiera behov i verksamheten och driva införande av ny teknologi, med ett stort fokus på AI.
* Öka användning och effekt av AI genom utbildning och förändringsledning.
* Leda arbetet med att hantera tekniska, säkerhetsmässiga och juridiska förutsättningar för ny teknologi samt skapa förankring hos nyckelintressenter.
* Driva utredningar och mindre projekt som främjar digital innovation från idé till värdeskapande lösning.


 Du kommer att få möjlighet att delta i kurser, workshops och konferenser för att hålla dig uppdaterad inom de senaste teknikerna och trenderna inom AI och digital innovation. Du kommer också att kunna utvecklas inom framtidens energiteknik hos den centrala spelaren i Sverige för energiomställningen.
   

  

**Om dig**
**Skallkrav**
 Vi söker dig som har god samarbetsförmåga och tycker om att skapa resultat tillsammans med kollegor. För att trivas i rollen ser vi att du är lösningsorienterad och lägger vikt vid att hålla dig informerad och lära nytt inom ditt yrkesområde. Som person är du organiserad och bra på att planera och slutföra det som påbörjas. Du är en doer som kan lyfta blicken och se helheten samt en mycket duktig kommunikatör. Vi lägger stor vikt vid personliga egenskaper.
   

  

 Du har en akademisk examen från högskola eller universitet, alternativt motsvarande kompetens förvärvad på annat sätt. Du har även:
   

  

* Erfarenhet av att driva projekt för att integrera generativ AI i verksamhetsprocesser.
* Erfarenhet av att identifiera och omsätta ny teknologi till verksamhetsnytta utifrån behov i verksamheten.
* Erfarenhet av att driva förändring i större organisationer inklusive att skapa förankring och framdrift i komplexa strukturer.
* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av att driva utredningar och projekt samt omvandla komplexa frågor till tydliga beslutsunderlag för ledningsnivå – gärna med erfarenhet från rådgivande eller konsultativt arbete.
* Erfarenhet av affärs- eller verksamhetsutveckling.
* Goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska.


 Det är
 **meriterande** 
 om du har erfarenhet av att utbilda och/eller öka förmåga hos andra inom ny teknologi eller arbetssätt.
   

  

**Bra att veta**
* Tjänsten är placerad i Sundbyberg.
* Möjlighet till distansarbete upp till 50 %
* Sista ansökningsdag är den 8 december 2025. Vi använder urvalsfrågor istället för personligt brev, därför behöver vi bara ditt CV skrivet på svenska.
* Tjänsten är en tillsvidaretjänst.
* I denna rekryteringsprocess kan tester komma att tillämpas för slutkandidat/er.
* Förmåner | Svenska kraftnät


**Vid frågor, kontakta gärna**
* Daniel Hellqvist, rekryterande chef, 072 590 24 00
* Victoria Waltenberg, rekryterare, 010 350 90 45
* Annika Ingeborn, SACO, 010 475 87 72
* Erica Midfjäll, ST, 010 475 87 31


 Du når oss också via e-post: fornamn.efternamn@svk.se.
   

  

 Jobba här – bli en viktig del av vår energiframtid | Svenska kraftnät
   

  

 Vi undanber oss direktkontakt med bemannings- och rekryteringsföretag samt säljare i samband med rekrytering, vi har upphandlade avtal som gäller för Svenska kraftnät som statlig myndighet.
   

  

 Övrig information
   

  

 Vi ställer höga krav på våra medarbetares säkerhets- och sekretessmedvetenhet. Innan ett beslut om anställning fattas kommer en säkerhetsprövning enligt säkerhetsskyddslagen (2018:585) att genomföras i de fall befattningen innebär hantering av säkerhetsskyddsklassificerade uppgifter eller deltagande i säkerhetskänslig verksamhet. Om anställningen avser befattning i säkerhetsklass kommer säkerhetsprövningen även att innefatta en registerkontroll och, i vissa fall, en särskild personutredning. För anställning på Svenska kraftnät kan det vara ett krav på svenskt medborgarskap i vissa befattningar. Med anställningen följer en skyldighet att krigsplaceras. För mer information om säkerhetsprövning Svenska kraftnät arbetar för att främja mångfald och motverka diskriminering och ser gärna sökanden med olika bakgrund och erfarenheter till våra rekryteringar. Lär känna Svenska kraftnät och hur det är att arbeta hos oss: Lär känna oss på Svenska kraftnät

title: Software Engineer for a growing AI company
description:
Are you a Software Engineer with an interest in working on the frontline of ML and deep learning? If so, this position might be something for you!
 



  





 Join a fast-growing AI scale-up recognised as a global leader in the field. The company specializes in developing intelligent products using artificial intelligence applications on small chips (Edge AI or tinyML). They have showcased groundbreaking innovations like the world's first gesture-controlled in-ear headphones at the Embedded World conference in Germany. Now, they are looking to grow their development team!
 



  





**About the Position:** 




 As a Software Engineer, you'll have the opportunity to join a skilled product development team comprising creative and innovative Software Engineers and AI researchers. Together, they are shaping the future of Edge AI. In this role, you will play a crucial role in the advancement of the company’s Machine Learning development platform. Your focus will be on improving the desktop client, used by customers to build state-of-the-art ML applications for embedded devices. You'll collaborate with a skilled team of Software Engineers and ML researchers, working on implementing new features, enhancing user interfaces, and shortening the development life-cycle.
 



  





**What you will do?** 



* Collaborate with experienced software engineers to enhance and develop the company’s key product.
* Collaborate with ML engineers to improve their ML training module and visualise model performance.
* Write high-quality software in collaboration with other skilled engineers.
* Shape the future of AI as we know it!



  





**We are looking for someone who has...** 



* Experience of programming with C#/.NET.
* Experience in building WPF applications.
* Strong sense of ownership and a proactive approach.
* Excellent collaboration skills and the ability to work effectively in a team.
* A good level of English.



  





**It’s an extra bonus if you have…** 



* Side projects: hobbies are always a plus!
* General knowledge of object-oriented programming.
* Understanding of neural network design and proficiency in one or more ML frameworks.
* Knowledge of data analysis, statistics, signal processing, and practical applications.
* Worked with MVVM.
* Have a good level of Swedish.



  





**What’s in it for you?** 



* The opportunity to contribute to a development platform, recognised as a leader in bringing deep learning to the edge.
* A collaborative international team focused on a common goal.
* Real-world problem-solving using ML technologies.
* Competitive salary, wellness allowance, and option program.
* A flexible and open-minded company culture.
* Growth opportunities and career advancement.
* Short decision paths and a proactive work environment.
* Centrally located office in Stockholm with work-from-home flexibility.



  





 Sound interesting? Click apply!
 



  





  





*Please note that Ninox is an external recruitment partner recruiting on behalf of a client.*

title: Backend Engineer – Platform Developer Experience
description:
At Spotify, the AiKA squad is pioneering the future of AI-powered code generation and developer productivity. We build scalable backend systems that integrate Generative AI (GenAI) into engineering workflows, with a focus on Honk — our autonomous coding agent for large-scale code modifications and technology migrations.
   

  

 By joining us, you’ll help shape how developers worldwide work with AI-powered tools, streamlining workflows and enabling innovation at scale. You’ll work at the intersection of backend engineering, AI/ML, and developer tooling in a fast-moving, startup-like environment.
   

  

 What You'll Do
   

  

* Build and own our autonomous coding agent, developing the backend infrastructure for our autonomous coding agent
* Integrate LLMs and agentic workflows into production systems
* Scale backend infrastructure with robust services in Python/TypeScript at enterprise level
* Design agentic workflows that understand, plan, and execute code changes across large codebases
* Enhance developer experience by integrating seamlessly with CI/CD pipelines and developer tools
* Ensure reliability and quality by delivering testable, observable, and maintainable backend code
* Drive innovation and leadership by experimenting with new AI models and contributing to technical direction


 Who You Are
   

  

* You have backend expertise with Python, Java, or TypeScript/Node.js and cloud platforms
* You understand LLMs & agentic workflows (prompt engineering, orchestration, AI tools like Copilot/Claude)
* You design scalable systems that address reliability, latency, and cost challenges in AI-powered environments
* You are experienced in DevOps (Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD, monitoring)
* You value code quality and own systems from design to production
* You collaborate effectively across diverse teams (AI researchers, PMs, engineers)
* You thrive in dynamic environments, learning and adapting as AI technologies evolve


 Where You'll Be
   

  

* This role is based in London
* We offer you the flexibility to work where you work best! There will be some in person meetings, but still allows for flexibility to work from home.


 Spotify is an equal opportunity employer. You are welcome at Spotify for who you are, no matter where you come from, what you look like, or what’s playing in your headphones. Our platform is for everyone, and so is our workplace. The more voices we have represented and amplified in our business, the more we will all thrive, contribute, and be forward-thinking! So bring us your personal experience, your perspectives, and your background. It’s in our differences that we will find the power to keep revolutionizing the way the world listens.
   

  

 At Spotify, we are passionate about inclusivity and making sure our entire recruitment process is accessible to everyone. We have ways to request reasonable accommodations during the interview process and help assist in what you need. If you need accommodations at any stage of the application or interview process, please let us know - we’re here to support you in any way we can.
   

  

 Spotify transformed music listening forever when we launched in 2008. Our mission is to unlock the potential of human creativity by giving a million creative artists the opportunity to live off their art and billions of fans the chance to enjoy and be passionate about these creators. Everything we do is driven by our love for music and podcasting. Today, we are the world’s most popular audio streaming subscription service.

title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.
   

  

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*
**Your Profile (Must-have Requirements)**
 The ideal candidate has solid hands-on experience with Kotlin and Ktor, working in an agile environment with microservices running on AWS.
   

  

 Leadership skills are important, as the role involves supporting and guiding a distributed team of seven developers across multiple regions.
   

  

 Previous experience in fintech is required, and familiarity with payments or extended warranties is a valuable plus.
   

  

**Technical Skills**
**Must Have:**
 Agile Team lead
   

  

 Amazon RDS
   

  

 FinTech
   

  

 Kotlin
   

  

 Ktor
   

  

 Microservices
   

  

 MongoDB
   

  

**Application deadline:** 
 15-12-2025
   

  

**About Us**
 We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.
   

  

 Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?
   

  

 We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.
   

  

 🌟 A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.
   

  

 🚗 Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.
   

  

 💼 Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.
   

  

 🌴 Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?
   

  

 🏥 Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.
   

  

 📚 Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.
   

  

 🕑 Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?
   

  

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Fullstackutvecklare
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.
   

  

**Din profil (Skall krav)**
* Minst 5 års erfarenhet av produktutveckling, gärna inom SaaS eller andra digitalt drivna företag.
* Mycket god erfarenhet av moderna tekniker såsom C#, Java, Angular/Typescript, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Entity Framework, SQL Server samt REST API:er.
* Erfarenhet av molnplattformar såsom AWS, Azure eller Google Cloud.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med AI-relaterade applikationer eller verktyg.
* Förmåga att skriva ren, strukturerad och skalbar kod.
* Flytande svenska i tal och skrift.


**Sista ansökningdatum:** 
 11-12-2025
   

  

**Om Oss**
 Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?
   

  

 Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Här påverkar du din egen lön som helt och hållet som baseras på ditt timpris mot kund.
   

  

 Vår lönemodell är en hybridlösning mellan en fast månadslön och en provisionsbaserad ersättning. Det innebär att din månadslön baseras på ditt timpris, fast om du mot förmodan skulle stå utan uppdrag så behåller du en grund lön fram tills vi hittat ett nytt uppdrag, bra va?
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.
   

  

 🌟 En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.
   

  

 🚗 Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.
   

  

 💼 Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.
   

  

 🌴 Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?
   

  

 🏥 Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.
   

  

 📚 Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.
   

  

 🕑 Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?
   

  

* Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description:
**MACHINE LEARNING ENGINEER**
 Would you like to work in an international environment where you’ll make a difference every day? At Permobil, we’re looking for game-changers to join us as we innovate for individuals and develop the world’s most advanced assistive solutions.
   

  

 At
 **Permobil** 
 , the people who use our products come first. Our purpose is to create advanced assistive solutions that make the lives of adults and children living with disabilities more enriching. Our people are passionate about pushing the boundaries of technology to deliver innovations that improve lives. We are a sustainable and responsible business committed to continuous improvement, and our customers can trust us to provide market-leading solutions driven by insights-based clinical data.
   

  

**Position Overview**
 As a
 **Machine Learning Engineer** 
 , you will play a key role in building the AI core that powers Permobil’s next generation of intelligent systems – ranging from internal copilots and automation agents to customer-facing assistive technologies. In this role, you will design, deploy, and optimize the models and pipelines that bring advanced intelligence into our platform. Working within a modern Azure AI ecosystem, you will connect LLMs, embeddings, knowledge graphs, and real-world business data to create production-ready AI solutions that deliver measurable impact. You will collaborate closely with AI developers, data scientists, and backend engineers to transform cutting-edge models into scalable, secure, and well-governed AI services that support Permobil’s mission to improve lives through innovation.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Design and implement ML pipelines for model training, evaluation, and deployment using Azure Machine Learning, AI Foundry, and Fabric Notebooks,
* Build and maintain retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) and embedding pipelines leveraging Azure OpenAI Service, Cognitive Search, and Azure Storage,
* Develop robust data ingestion and preprocessing workflows using Fabric or Databricks,
* Implement continuous training and evaluation loops following MLOps principles in Azure DevOps or GitHub Actions,
* Collaborate with AI developers to integrate models into production services such as FastAPI, gRPC, or event-driven architectures,
* Monitor and optimize model performance, cost, and latency across multiple environments,
* Contribute to internal SDKs for model orchestration, feature engineering, and evaluation frameworks.


**Qualifications & Skills**
* Master’s or Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field,
* Strong proficiency in Python and modern ML frameworks such as PyTorch or TensorFlow,
* Deep understanding of Azure Machine Learning, AI Foundry, and the broader Azure AI/ML ecosystem,
* Experience deploying and scaling models using AKS, App Services, or Azure Container Instances,
* Solid experience working with data pipelines and feature engineering using Data Factory, Fabric, or Databricks,
* Strong understanding of vector search, embeddings, and RAG architectures,
* Familiarity with CI/CD practices, model registries, monitoring, and ML governance principles,
* Experience working in agile development environments,
* Fluency in English; proficiency in Swedish is considered a plus.


**Meriting Skills**
* Experience with LLM fine-tuning, prompt engineering, and custom embedding generation,
* Knowledge of orchestration frameworks such as LangChain, Semantic Kernel, or similar tools,
* Exposure to Azure Cognitive Services, Responsible AI practices, or AI governance frameworks,
* Background in data-centric AI, including evaluation and benchmarking of generative model quality.


**Who are you?**
 You are a leader who inspires and motivates those around you, using your influence to drive collaboration and alignment across teams and stakeholders at all levels. You communicate clearly and actively, ensuring that ideas are shared, understood, and acted upon. You embrace experimentation and encourage others to do the same, understanding that innovation often comes from taking calculated risks. You see failure not as a setback, but as a stepping stone – an opportunity to learn, grow, and ultimately achieve better results. Your mindset fosters a culture of curiosity, resilience, and continuous improvement.
   

  

**Why is Permobil the next step for you?**
* You’ll make a difference. Every day. Everything we do leads to understanding and improving the lives of our users. Through our evidence-based innovation, we make a difference to people’s lives.
* You’ll make your mark as part of our future. We collaborate with colleagues across borders to Innovate for Individuals. The impact you make personally could lead change around the world.
* You’ll feel welcome from day one. We’re known for being great colleagues, who are collaborative, fun and at the cutting-edge. Everyone at Permobil cares as much as you do about making a positive difference.


**Application Process**
 We will conduct selection continuously so send us your application today or before
 **January 10th** 
 at the latest!
   

  

 Permobil is an equal opportunity employer committed to diversity and inclusion. We welcome applications from all qualified individuals.
   

  

 For more information about the position, please contact Christoffer Stigson, Director Digital Transformation, christoffer.stigson@permobil.com
   

  

 For information about the recruitment process, please contact Zivile Mitkute, Talent Acquisition Partner, zivile.mitkute@permobil.com
   

  

**Please respect that we do not wish recruitment assistance or advertising, we decline calls from recruitment and advertising providers.**
**More About Permobil**
 Permobil founder Dr. Per Uddén believed that helping people achieve the greatest level of independence is a basic human right and, for over 50 years, Permobil has held fast to that belief. Permobil is a global leader in advanced rehabilitation technology, passionate about better understanding our users’ needs and improving their quality of life through state-of-the-art healthcare solutions. Today, those solutions include power wheelchairs, seating and positioning products, power assist, and manual wheelchairs.
   

  

 Permobil is part of Patricia Industries, a subsidiary of Investor AB, and is headquartered in Sweden. Permobil has 2 000 team members in 18 countries around the world. For more information regarding the company’s storied history and complete product line, visit permobil.com.

title: Dynamicsutvecklare
description:
Vi söker en erfaren Dynamicsutvecklare som kan bidra till att öka utvecklingstakten i en större kundportalsatsning, inklusive vidareutveckling av Self Service-funktionalitet. Uppdraget är en del av ett etablerat produktteam där utvecklare, testare, verksamhetsspecialister, systemarkitekter och produktägare arbetar tätt tillsammans.
   

  

**Uppdragsbeskrivning / arbetsuppgifter**
* Vidareutveckling av kundportalen Mina Sidor och Self Service-flöden
* Bygga och optimera lösningar i Dynamics-miljön
* Utveckling kopplat till Power Pages
* Samarbete inom ett agilt produktteam och aktiv medverkan i planering, refinement och leverans
* Säkerställa kvalitet och stabilitet i lösningar genom god kodpraxis och löpande förbättringsarbete


**Skallkrav**
* Minst 3 års erfarenhet av Dynamicsutveckling
